TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EndpointAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供客户端用来与服务终结点进行通信的唯一网络地址。

span.span: Provides a unique network address that a client uses to communicate with a service endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 终结点地址唯一标识服务的终结点。An endpoint address uniquely identifies the endpoint for a service. 终结点地址属于服务终结点。服务终结点还包含终结点的绑定、协定和行为。The endpoint address belongs to the service endpoint, which also contains the binding, contract and behaviors for the endpoint. 包含一个 URI，以及包括标识、WSDL 元素和可选标头集合在内的地址属性。The contains a URI and address properties that include an identity, WSDL elements, and a collection of optional headers. 可选标头用于提供其他更多详细寻址信息来标识终结点或与终结点交互。The optional headers are used to provide additional, more detailed addressing information to identify or interact with the endpoint. 例如，它们可用于指示当有多个实例可用时，要使用哪个服务实例来处理从特定用户传入的消息。For example, they can be used to indicate which instance of a service is to be used to process an incoming message from a particular user when multiple instances are available. 你可以通过使用代码以强制方式或通过配置以声明方式指定服务的终结点地址。The endpoint address for a service can be specified either imperatively using code or declaratively through configuration. 在代码中定义终结点通常是不可行的，因为已部署服务的绑定和地址通常与在部署服务时所用的绑定和地址不同。Defining endpoints in code is usually not practical because the bindings and addresses for a deployed service are typically different from those used while the service is being developed. 它是定义使用配置的服务终结点更为可行。It is more practical to define service endpoints using configuration. 不实现 接口，因此不可序列化。 does not implement the interface and so is not serializable. 若要使终结点作为服务协定的一部分进行公开，它必须是可序列化的，而且还必须与 Web 服务寻址 (WS-Addressing) 协议兼容。For an endpoint to be exposed as part of a service contract it must be serializable and it must also be compliant with the Web Service Addressing (WS-Addressing) protocol. 与 WS-Addressing 1.0 版和 2004 年 8 月版兼容的可序列化终结点分别由 和 类提供。Serializable endpoints that are compliant with version 1.0 and the August 2004 version of WS-Addressing are provided, respectively, by the and classes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/hostapplication.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-Addressing 规范允许任意扩展元素出现在使用 获取的终结点引用 (EPR) 末尾处。The WS-Addressing specification allows for arbitrary extension elements to appear at the end of an Endpoint Reference (EPR) that can be obtained using an . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实例化 ，以指定 、、标头集合、元数据 和扩展 。The following code shows how to instantiate a that specifies a , an , a headers collection, a metadata and an extension . summary.span: 获取匿名 URI 的与版本无关的表示形式。

span.span: Gets a version-neutral representation of the anonymous URI.
A with the value http://schemas.microsoft.com/2005/12/ServiceModel/Addressing/Anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用于初始化构造函数的 URI 的值为 ，则 设置为 `true`。If the value of the URI used to initialize the constructor is the , then is set to `true`. 是一个与版本无关的类， 属性会返回一个采用非特定表示形式的值。 is a version-neutral class and the property returns a value is a neutral representation. 当您尝试将它写出或转换到某个版本时，它就会转变为该版本的适当值。When you write this out or convert this to one version or the other, then it turns into the right value for that version. 由于目前大量网络技术的广泛应用（例如 NAT、DHCP 和防火墙），许多部署都不能将一个有意义的全局 URI 分配给指定的终结点。Due to the range of network technologies currently in widespread use (for example, NAT, DHCP, and firewalls), many deployments cannot assign a meaningful global URI to a given endpoint. 为了让这些*匿名*终结点可以启动消息交换模式和接收答复，Web 服务寻址规范定义了[URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169)以供无法拥有稳定的终结点解析 URI。To allow these *anonymous* endpoints to initiate message exchange patterns and receive replies, the Web Services Addressing specification defines a [URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169) for use by endpoints that cannot have a stable, resolvable URI. 使用此地址的请求必须提供某种机制，用以发送答复或错误（例如，在相同的传输连接上返回答复）。Requests that use this address must provide some mechanism for delivering replies or faults (for example, returning the reply on the same transport connection). 此机制可以是请求/答复传输协议（例如 HTTP GET 或 POST）。This mechanism can be a request/reply transport protocol (for example, HTTP GET or POST). 此 URI 可用作答复消息的目标位置，而不应用作其他情况的目标位置。This URI can be used as the destination for reply messages and should not be used as the destination in other circumstances. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/snippets.cs#13)]

span.span: Assigns the URI and properties of the endpoint address to the values of the headers of a specified message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用当前 的 来设置消息的“To”。The method sets the "To" of the message with the of the current . 请记住，这里“ApplyTo”的意思是“将此地址应用到消息的‘To’标头”。Remember that "ApplyTo" means here "apply this address to the 'To' header of the message". ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将终结点地址的 URI 和属性应用到消息的标头。The following code shows how to apply the URI and properties of an endpoint address to the headers of a message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以在将 URI 从 手动复制到 或 的 URI 时检查 。Use this method to check for the when manually copying the URI from an to the URI of either a or a . 此操作必须执行，因为 和 都具有特殊的匿名值。This must be done because both and have special anonymous values. 如果复制的 URI 是匿名的，则用户必须使用这些值。Users must use these values if the URI being copied is anonymous. 由于目前大量网络技术的广泛应用（例如 NAT、DHCP 和防火墙），许多部署都不能将一个有意义的全局 URI 分配给指定的终结点。Due to the range of network technologies currently in widespread use (for example, NAT, DHCP, and firewalls), many deployments cannot assign a meaningful global URI to a given endpoint. 为了让这些*匿名*终结点可以启动消息交换模式和接收答复，Web 服务寻址规范定义了[URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169)以供无法拥有稳定的终结点解析 URI。To allow these *anonymous* endpoints to initiate message exchange patterns and receive replies, the Web Services Addressing specification defines a [URI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96169) for use by endpoints that cannot have a stable, resolvable URI. 使用此地址的请求必须提供某种机制，用以发送答复或错误（例如，在相同的传输连接上返回答复）。Requests that use this address must provide some mechanism for delivering replies or faults (for example, returning the reply on the same transport connection). 此机制可以是请求/答复传输协议（例如 HTTP GET 或 POST）。This mechanism can be a request/reply transport protocol (for example, HTTP GET or POST). 此 URI 可用作答复消息的目标位置，而不应用作其他情况的目标位置。This URI can be used as the destination for reply messages and should not be used as the destination in other circumstances. ## Examples [!code-csharp[EndpointAddress#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/endpointaddress/cs/snippets.cs#16)]
